summary: A former barber escapes from a high security prison. Flashback story of an escape from the lonely, high-security Dartmoor Prison.
cast: Hans Adalbert Schlettow|Uno Henning|Norah Baring|Anthony Asquith|Judd Green
keywords: moor the landscape|threatened with a knife|escape from prison|pathological jealousy|british countryside
title: A Cottage on Dartmoor
